title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Nonlinear Pedagogy-Based Decision-Making for Adolescent Soccer Players

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners achieve decision-making accuracy of over 80% in small-scale game scenarios
